title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away it is modified.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label and edit its font size as 18 points.
OB: When the font size of the label is modified, the height of the label remains the same.
EB: The height of the label should adjust automatically to fit the new font size when it is modified.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to 18 points.
